name: Idanre Hills
description: A UNESCO-recognized wonder consisting of over 700 steps, ancient settlements, shrines, and breathtaking panoramic views. One of the most iconic natural attractions in Nigeria.

name: Araromi Beach
description: A long, peaceful, and pristine coastline stretching along the Atlantic Ocean. Perfect for relaxation, tourism, photography, and seaside adventure.

name: Owo Museum of Antiquities
description: A museum housing rare Yoruba and Benin artifacts, showcasing centuries of craftsmanship, bronze works, and traditional art unique to Owo Kingdom.

name: Cave of Ashes (Iwo Eleru)
description: A prehistoric archaeological site where some of the earliest human remains in West Africa were discovered. A significant cultural and scientific landmark.

name: Igbo Olodumare Forest
description: A mysterious ancient forest referenced in literature and folklore. Known for its deep greenery, mythical stories, and magical ambiance.

name: Okitipupa Palm Oil Belt
description: A commercial zone famous for large-scale palm oil production, offering agro-tourism experiences, processing tours, and insights into Ondo's agricultural strength.

name: Akure Shopping Mall
description: A modern retail and leisure center featuring a variety of stores, eateries, and entertainment spotsâ€”popular for business meetings and family outings.

name: Smokey Mountain (Oke-Oromion)
description: A scenic elevated landscape surrounded by misty clouds during certain seasons. Loved by hikers, adventurers, and nature photographers.
